decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 8 October 2022.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 08 October2019 by the Planning Inspectorate [LBI ref: [P2018/1472/FUL].    Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
description:
Section 73 (Minor material amendent to allow for the variation of conditions 2 (drawing numbers) 3 (materials), 4 (lighting scheme), 5 (methodology for loadbearing brickwork), 6 (soot washing), and 10 (bird nesting boxes) of previously approved ref. P2021/1305/S73 which allowed for Section 73 (minor material amendment) for the removal or variation of a condition 2 (Approved plans) and 7(cycle storage facilities) of P2018/1472/FUL for 'Erection of a three storey rear infill extension to the second, third and fourth floors and fifth floor roof extension above, including roof terraces, to provide additional office (B1 Use) accommodation (171 sqm).  Internal reconfiguration and alterations to entrance including a new ground floor pedestrian access and replacement of existing single glazed timber framed windows with a mixture of both timber framed and timber and metal framed double glazed framed windows to ground and upper floors, and associated works' approved at appeal ref:APP/V5570/W/19/3220312 on 08/10/2019.  The alterations include:
(a) design changes at roof level
(b) alterations to ground floor front elevation to include a dry riser inlet
